content.en: MIMO Optimization: Researchers have been investigating various techniques to improve the performance of communication systems using multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) technology. These techniques involve the use of algorithms to address challenges such as interference and channel variations. For example, algorithms based on correlation and kurtosis optimization criteria are used to cancel interference in MIMO channels, while adaptive power control and beamforming frameworks optimize MIMO link capacity. Other algorithms focus on developing low-complexity equalizers for frequency selective MIMO channels and improving the robustness of adaptive decision feedback equalizers in time-varying channel environments. These advancements aim to enhance the efficiency and reliability of MIMO communication systems.
content.da: MIMO-optimering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige teknikker til at forbedre ydeevnen af kommunikationssystemer ved brug af multiple-input multiple-output (MIMO) teknologi. Disse teknikker involverer brugen af algoritmer til at tackle udfordringer som interferens og kanalvariationer. For eksempel bruges algoritmer baseret på korrelations- og kurtosis-optimeringskriterier til at eliminere interferens i MIMO-kanaler, mens adaptive effektstyrings- og beamforming-rammer optimerer MIMO-linkkapacitet. Andre algoritmer fokuserer på at udvikle lav-kompleksitets equalizere til frekvensselektive MIMO-kanaler og forbedre robustheden af adaptive feedback equalizere i tidsskiftende kanal omgivelser. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at forbedre effektiviteten og pålideligheden af MIMO-kommunikationssystemer.
